sentences.en: Adopt latest physiotherapy concept, correct back sitting position, keep your back relaxation.
sentences.cn: 采用最先进的理疗设计, 矫正背部坐姿, 保持久坐腰部放松.

sentences.en: Despite a grueling daily schedule of physiotherapy, the outlook remained bleak.
sentences.cn: 尽管每天都严格坚持物理治疗, 前景还是令人担忧.

sentences.en: He received physiotherapy and therapy for the swallowing disorder.
sentences.cn: 曾接受过治疗吞咽障碍方面的理疗和其它治疗.

sentences.en: He will receive physiotherapy on his damaged left knee.
sentences.cn: 因左膝受伤，他将接受物理治疗。

sentences.en: Health Sciences such as Medicine, Dentistry , Pharmacy, Physiotherapy and Physical Education.
sentences.cn: 健康科学,如内科, 牙医, 药剂学,临床和物理教育.

sentences.en: Including physiotherapy and occupational therapy and speech therapy, and so on.
sentences.cn: 包括物理治疗、职业治疗和语言治疗等.

sentences.en: Irritability dermatitis this how Where is physiotherapy?
sentences.cn: 过敏性皮炎该如何理疗 呢 ?

sentences.en: Please go with this paper to the physiotherapy department for treatment.
sentences.cn: 请你拿这张单子到理疗科去作治疗.

sentences.en: Purpose To observe effect on physiotherapy cures prolapse of lumbar intervertebral disc.
sentences.cn: 目的观察物理疗法治疗腰椎间盘突出症的效果.

sentences.en: Suggestions to the safety protection of high frequency physiotherapy devices are given.
sentences.cn: 对使用高频理疗设备提出了安全防护建议,供相关人员借鉴.

sentences.en: The structure design for the physiotherapy system of compound light is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了具有温度控制功能的复合光物理治疗系统的结构设计.

sentences.en: What was your employment status in the physiotherapy profession as at 31.3.2005?
sentences.cn: 你于2005年3月31日在物理治疗专业内属何雇佣类别?

sentences.en: What was your employment status in the physiotherapy profession as at 31.3.2006?
sentences.cn: 你于2006年3月31日在物理治疗专业内属何雇佣类别?

sentences.en: What was your employment status in the physiotherapy profession as at 31.3.2007?
sentences.cn: 你于2007年3月31日在物理治疗专业内属何雇佣类别?

trans.tran_en: a treatment that uses special exercises, rubbing, heat etc to treat medical conditions and problems with muscles
